item.title: Demonstrating Diffie-Hellman Key Exchange with OpenSSL
item.description: The Diffie-Hellman key exchange algorithm is widely used in HTTPS to securely establish a shared secret between a client and server, even over an insecure channel. In this post, we’ll use openssl s_client to connect to a real-world HTTPS server and examine how ECDHE (ephemeral elliptic curve Diffie-Hellman) is used.

item.title: Flappy Bird
item.description: 本项目是对经典游戏 Flappy Bird 的增强版本，结合了 Pygame、OpenCV 和 MediaPipe 等技术，实现了更自然、更沉浸的手势交互体验。玩家无需按键，通过摄像头识别的挥手动作即可控制小鸟跳跃，在躲避水管的挑战中获得更具趣味性的操作方式。
